desc: The best tropical fruits, simply dried into delicious & nutritious dried fruit snacks. 100% Fruit with nothing ever added, our healthy fruit snacks are Vegan, Gluten Free, 1 of your 5 a day and Carbon Neutral too. Dried Dragon Fruit | Dragon Fruit Chips | Dried Mango | Mango Chips | Jackfruit Chips

layout.text: 100% Fruit. Simply dried. Nothing ever added.
